judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno, Arnold, Jones and Cohen, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The judgment for the defendant on the pleadings is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Walter R. Soiin, reported in 8 D. & C. 2d 780.
Mr. Justice Musmanno dissents.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: James Lenahan Brown, with him Joseph L. O’Donnell, for appellants.
Barry J. Rubin, Deputy Attorney General, with him J oseph L. Donnelly, Deputy Attorney General, and Thomas D. McBride, Attorney General, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Brown, Appellant, v. Finnegan.
Argued June 27, 1957.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno, Arnold, Jones and Cohen, JJ.
James Lenahan Brown, with him Joseph L. O’Donnell, for appellants.
Barry J. Rubin, Deputy Attorney General, with him J oseph L. Donnelly, Deputy Attorney General, and Thomas D. McBride, Attorney General, for appellee.
June 28, 1957:
